languages.text: "Почему же — именно для этого. И, полагаю, я уже занял у вас достаточно времени". {n}Хейнрикс несколько торопливо одергивает камзол.{/n} "В других обстоятельствах я бы и попросил о более обстоятельной беседе, однако вас ждут ваши дела".

traits.locale_text: "Почему же — именно для этого. И, полагаю, я уже занял у вас достаточно времени". {n}Хейнрикс несколько торопливо одерживает камзол.{/n} "В других обстоятельствах я бы и попросил о более обстоятельной беседе, однако вас ждут ваши подданные — и ваши дела".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
languages.original_text: "Почему же — именно для этого. И, полагаю, я уже занял у вас достаточно времени". {n}Хейнрикс несколько торопливо одергивает камзол.{/n} "В других обстоятельствах я бы и попросил о более обстоятельной беседе, однако вас ждут ваши дела".

traits.locale_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his doublet.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his doublet.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his doublet.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你为什么会这么……我来这里，完全就是出于这个目的。而且，我相信我已经占用了你太多时间。”{n}海因里希有些匆忙地正了正他的衣襟。{/n}“如果是换做其他情况，我很愿意和你进行更加深入的交谈，但你还有别的事情要处理。”
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么会这么……我来这里，完全就是出于这个目的。而且，我相信我已经占用了你太多时间。”{n}海因里希有些匆忙地正了正他的扣子。{/n}“如果是换做其他情况，我很愿意和你进行更加深入的交谈，但你还有别的事情要处理。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué iba a... he venido precisamente a eso. Y creo que ya he ocupado demasiado su tiempo». {n}Heinrix se alisa la chaqueta con prisa.{/n} «En otras circunstancias habría solicitado una reunión más prolongada, pero tiene otros asuntos que atender».
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué iba a... he venido precisamente a eso. Y creo que ya he ocupado demasiado su tiempo». {n}Heinrix se alisa el jubón con prisa.{/n} «En otras circunstancias habría solicitado una reunión más prolongada, pero tiene otros asuntos que atender».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「どうしてそんなことを…それこそが我が来た理由だ。それに、我はもうあなたの時間を奪いすぎてしまった」{n}ハインリックスはやや慌ててジャケットを整えた。{/n}「他の状況であれば、もっと突っ込んだ話をしたいところだったが、あなたには大事な仕事があるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしてそんなことを…それこそが我が来た理由だ。それに、我はもうあなたの時間を奪いすぎてしまった」{n}ハインリックスはやや慌ててジャケットを整えた。{/n}「他の状況であれば、もっと突っ込んだ話をしたいところだったが、あなたには大事な仕事があるはずだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous... Je n'avais pas d'autre raison de venir vous voir. Je crois d'ailleurs vous avoir fait perdre suffisamment de temps, {n}dit Heinrix en ajustant sa veste d'un geste fébrile.{/n} Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais apprécié de poursuivre cette conversation, mais vous avez mieux à faire. »
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous... Je n'avais pas d'autre raison de venir vous voir. Je crois d'ailleurs vous avoir fait perdre suffisamment de temps, {n}dit Heinrix en ajustant son pourpoint d'un geste fébrile.{/n} Dans d'autres circonstances, j'aurais apprécié de poursuivre cette conversation, mais vous avez mieux à faire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Warum würdet Ihr ... genau deswegen bin ich hierhergekommen. Und ich denke, ich habe Euch schon genug beschäftigt." {n}Heinrix macht hastig seine Jacke zurecht.{/n} "Unter anderen Umständen hätte ich mir ein tiefgreifendes Gespräch erbeten, aber Ihr müsst Euch um andere Angelegenheiten kümmern."
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

traits.locale_text: "Warum würdet Ihr ... genau deswegen bin ich hierhergekommen. Und ich denke, ich habe Euch schon genug beschäftigt." {n}Heinrix macht hastig sein Wams zurecht.{/n} "Unter anderen Umständen hätte ich mir ein tiefgreifendes Gespräch erbeten, aber Ihr müsst Euch um andere Angelegenheiten kümmern."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."

languages.text: "Neden öyle... Tam olarak bunun için geldim. Ayrıca vaktini hâlihazırda bir hayli çaldığım görüşündeyim." {n}Heinrix, alelacele ceketini düzeltiyor.{/n} "Farklı koşullar altında daha derin mevzular konuşabileceğimiz bir sohbet talep ederdim ancak dikkatini yöneltmen gereken başka meseleler var."
languages.original_text: "Why would you— that is exactly why I came. And I do believe I have already taken up too much of your time." {n}Heinrix somewhat hurriedly adjusts his jacket.{/n} "Under other circumstances, I would have requested a more in-depth conversation, but you have other matters to attend to."
